item.title: 🐘 chukwunonsoprosper/forgr (11 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: chukwunonsoprosper

📝 Repository: chukwunonsoprosper/forgr

📄 Descrizione: Forgr is an open-source PHP library that enables developers to instantly convert any PHP function into a fully functional RESTful API endpoint using a single universal route. Designed for simplicity and flexibility, Forgr handles all critical API infrastructure concerns out of the box, including CORS support, standardized JSON responses, JWT-based
